analysis.description:
MallcoinCrowdSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x393709845c63b7ac16ea60b6cda230a53693f2f4.sol#417-442) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.createToken(beneficiary,_buyTokens) (/unique_chucks/6/0x393709845c63b7ac16ea60b6cda230a53693f2f4.sol#440-441)

MallcoinCrowdSale.buyTokensByAtes (/unique_chucks/6/0x393709845c63b7ac16ea60b6cda230a53693f2f4.sol#443-471) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.createTokenByAtes(addr_,_buyTokens,data_) (/unique_chucks/6/0x393709845c63b7ac16ea60b6cda230a53693f2f4.sol#469-470)

MallcoinCrowdSale.finishCrowdSale (/unique_chucks/6/0x393709845c63b7ac16ea60b6cda230a53693f2f4.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.createToken(wallet,tokensFund) (/unique_chucks/6/0x393709845c63b7ac16ea60b6cda230a53693f2f4.sol)

MallcoinCrowdSale.ICO_BONUS_RATE should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x393709845c63b7ac16ea60b6cda230a53693f2f4.sol#376-377)
MallcoinCrowdSale.ICO_RATE should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x393709845c63b7ac16ea60b6cda230a53693f2f4.sol#374-375)
MallcoinCrowdSale.MAX_CROWD_SALE_TOKENS should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x393709845c63b7ac16ea60b6cda230a53693f2f4.sol#383-385)
